<details>
  <summary>The story behind Basi</summary>

  My name, **Basi**, comes from the oldest giant panda ever recorded, who lived in China until 37 years old. Her Chinese name å·´æ–¯ (BÄ sÄ«) became famous for symbolizing longevity and resilience. The name reflects how I approach design and software: creating quality work that lasts, not just chasing trends. Learn more about her on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Basi_(giant_panda)).
